name: EG Club
description: EG Club is a revolutionary Web3 fan ecosystem jointly launched by top esports IP G2 Esports and cutting-edge blockchain technology company Eris Industries. The project aims to break down barriers in traditional fan economies by establishing a new paradigm between the club and millions of global fans through Web3 technologyâ€”integrating identity recognition, deep interaction, co-creation of value, and shared benefits. EG Club is not just a fan club; it is a decentralized value community built on shared passion and mutual interests, where every fan's enthusiasm and contributions are quantified, recognized, and rewarded.
